title: Package sharing
description1: A simple react carousel component. It shows image automatically with optional navbar and control button. The rotation speed is also adjustable.
description2: A react type writer animation component. Pass the contents as string to it, all of them will show up letter by letter just like typing. And typing speed is adjustable.
description3: A button which can bring you bac to the top of page. You can decide when it appear by setting appearCoordinate. And the way moving back to top is also adjustable.
